abstract: Many Arab activists writing on social media saw the inclusion of a Yemeni activist as a nod to their efforts during the revolutions of the Arab Spring.
snippet: Many Arab activists writing on social media saw the inclusion of a Yemeni activist as a nod to their efforts during the revolutions of the Arab Spring.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: The message below, posted on Twitter by Wael Ghonim of Egypt, captured the sentiment of many Arab activists who use social media. Some of them, Mr. Ghonim included, had been thought to be favorites to win the prize themselves.

headline.main: Arab Activists Celebrate Yemeni's Nobel Prize
